ygData.subject: Re: arrow of fire
ygData.msgSnippet: I would imagine the point would be to hit magic only mobs.  I ve never heard a good answer to this, but I ve heard controversy as to whether this actually
ygData.messageBody:
I would imagine the point would be to hit magic only mobs. I've never heard a good answer to this, but I've heard controversy as to whether this actually works. I know using a magic only bow with regular arrows will not hit a magic only mob (so what the heck is the point of a magic bow?), but I have never heard a good answer as to a non-magic bow with magic arrows, or a magic bow with magic arrows. Has anyone ever tried this, and, if not, could you try it and post the results?

Another thing, has anyone here successfully made a trueshot longbow yet? I'm trying to get a good idea of the relative difficulty of this bow, and, if you've been able to make it, please post your skill level and the nuber of attempts it took (or even if you've tried, but not made it, post how many times you've failed). I'll start. I am skill 140, and I've failed 10 times, no success.

Slif of Povar
Wood elf Ranger
Master Fletcher, Master Potter

>>> <Paratoos@...> 07/18 4:31 PM >>>
From: Paratoos@...

In a message dated 7/18/99 1:36:33 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
tony_fullerton@... writes:

<< got a arrow of fire off of a npc last night. 4 dmg 100 range. anyone have
any idea what an arrow of fire is for ?
Mylan Swam - Lvl 22 - Halfling Druid
Rahig Swarm - Lvl 22 - Halfling Rogue >>

No...where'd you get it? I found Larktwitter arrows that are "Magic Item, dam
6, range 100"
Off of Whimsy Larktwitter in Lesser faydark...named Pixie NPC

Aurin, Lvl 21 Wood elf Ranger
